keywords.title: Search Keywords
keywords.description: Keywords to search for across platforms (e.g., 'AI automation', 'Supabase', 'consulting')

includePlatforms.title: Platforms to Search
includePlatforms.description: Which platforms to include in the search

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of profiles to return

minOverallScore.title: Minimum Overall Score
minOverallScore.description: Filter out profiles below this score (0-100). Note: investor_candidate and helper_expert profiles are always retained.

onlyNewProfiles.title: Only New Profiles
onlyNewProfiles.description: If true, update existing profiles instead of creating duplicates (based on platform + profile_url)

supabaseUrl.title: Supabase URL
supabaseUrl.description: Your Supabase project URL (e.g., https://xxxxx.supabase.co). Leave empty to only save to Apify dataset.

supabaseKey.title: Supabase API Key
supabaseKey.description: Your Supabase service role key. Required if Supabase URL is provided.

twitterBearerToken.title: Twitter/X Bearer Token
twitterBearerToken.description: Twitter API v2 Bearer Token for X/Twitter search. Get from https://developer.twitter.com/

youtubeApiKey.title: YouTube API Key
youtubeApiKey.description: YouTube Data API v3 key. Get from https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

googleSearchApiKey.title: Google Custom Search API Key
googleSearchApiKey.description: Google Custom Search API key for web search. Get from https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

googleSearchEngineId.title: Google Search Engine ID
googleSearchEngineId.description: Custom Search Engine ID. Get from https://programmablesearchengine.google.com/

redditClientId.title: Reddit Client ID
redditClientId.description: Reddit API Client ID. Get from https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps

redditClientSecret.title: Reddit Client Secret
redditClientSecret.description: Reddit API Client Secret. Get from https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps

questionSeekingMode.title: Question-Seeking Mode
questionSeekingMode.description: Enable question-seeking mode to find people actively asking questions (recommended for high-intent prospects)

includeComments.title: Include Comments (YouTube)
includeComments.description: Extract and analyze YouTube comments for questions (uses more API quota)

targetSubreddits.title: Target Subreddits (Reddit)
targetSubreddits.description: Specific subreddits to search without r/ prefix (e.g., 'UKPersonalFinance', not 'r/UKPersonalFinance'). Leave empty for default UK-focused list.

includeQuora.title: Include Quora
includeQuora.description: Enable Quora integration to find people asking UK-specific finance and property questions
